casebody.data:
Joseph Lee LAPSLEY, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. WD 80087 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: January 23, 2018 Randall Brachman, St. Louis, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Evan Buchheim, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Two: Anthony Rex Gabbert, P.J., Thomas H. Newton, and Gary D. Witt, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Joseph Lee Lapsley appeals the Jackson County Circuit Court judgment denying a Rule 24.035 amended motion for post-conviction relief. Mr. Lapsley pleaded guilty to first-degree domestic assault and was sentenced to seven years of imprisonment.

For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm in accordance with Rule 84.16(b).
